name: Push-Up Training
description: Train your body by performing push-ups with good form.
goal: Complete 10 push-ups, detected using the tilt sensor.

name: Plank Endurance
description: Hold a plank position for as long as you can.
goal: Maintain a plank for 30 seconds while staying within a fixed range from the ultrasonic sensor.

name: The Lift
description: Carefully lift and hold a valuable item without setting off an alarm.
goal: Lift the object and hold it steady for 5 seconds without triggering the tilt sensor.

name: Cutpurse
description: Pickpocket a noble by sneaking close — but stop just at the right distance or risk discovery.
goal: Swipe your hand 20–30 cm from the ultrasonic sensor.

name: The Forgotten Words
description: Recall and recite a forgotten spell from memory.
goal: Memorize a 3-word spell and type it correctly after 10 seconds.

name: Riddle of the Mind
description: Answer a magical riddle using your mind and logic.
